title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc, the ultimate disc for all your outdoor play needs! This high-quality disc is perfect for day or night play, with its incredible features and durable design.

With 36 LEDs, the TOSY Flying Disc lights up the sky with a vibrant display of 16 million colors in RGB. These LEDs are 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc, ensuring maximum visibility and excitement during nighttime play. 

But that's not all - the TOSY Flying Disc is packed with smart modes and motion sensors, making it a game-changer in the world of flying discs. You can adjust the brightness level to suit your preference and even set a timer mode for added convenience. The motion sensors automatically light up the disc, adding an extra level of fun and interactivity to your games.

No need to worry about running out of power during your playtime adventures. The TOSY Flying Disc is rechargeable and comes with a quick 30-minute charge duration. Once fully charged, it can provide up to a thousand throws or a full 90-minute match. The package includes a USB Type C to C cable for easy charging, ensuring you're always ready for action. 

Weighing in at just 175 grams, this disc is lightweight and easy to throw. It meets professional standards, making it perfect for freestyle tricks and various disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes. Its high durability and waterproof feature ensure that it can withstand even the most intense play sessions.

Get ready to take your outdoor play to the next level with the TOSY Flying Disc. Its long, straight, and precise flight quality combined with its comfortable grip make it a must-have for any disc enthusiast. Don't miss out on this incredible disc that combines innovation, durability, and endless fun.

Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc, the ultimate flying disc for all your outdoor fun! 

With 36 powerful LEDs, this disc lights up the night sky like never before. Its 16 million color RGB feature allows you to choose from a wide range of vibrant colors, making every throw a visually stunning experience. The LEDs are 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc, ensuring maximum visibility and excitement.

But that's not all - this disc is smart! It comes with various smart modes, including adjustable brightness levels and a timer mode. The motion sensors automatically light up the disc when it's in motion, adding an extra element of surprise to your games. 

Say goodbye to constantly buying batteries, because this disc is rechargeable. In just 30 minutes, you can fully charge it using the included USB Type C to C cable. Once charged, it can last for up to a thousand throws or a full 90 minutes match, ensuring endless hours of playtime.

Weighing in at 175 grams, this disc is designed to meet professional standards. It is perfect for night play, freestyle tricks, and popular disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes. Its durability is top-notch, as it is waterproof and built to withstand any outdoor adventure.

Upgrade your outdoor fun with the TOSY Flying Disc. Its bright LEDs, smart features, rechargeable design, and professional standard make it the ultimate choice for all disc enthusiasts. Get yours today and take your games to new heights!

Say goodbye to constantly buying batteries, as this disc is rechargeable. It only takes 30 minutes to fully charge, and you can enjoy up to a thousand throws or a 90-minute match before needing to recharge. The package includes a USB Type C to C cable for easy charging. 

Weighing at 175 grams, this disc is designed to meet professional standards, ensuring optimal performance and durability. It is perfect for night play, freestyle tricks, and various disc games such as Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes.

Experience the thrill of the TOSY Flying Disc and take your outdoor play to new heights. Get yours today and enjoy endless hours of fun!

Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc, the ultimate flying disc for all your outdoor fun and games! 

With its 36 LED lights, this disc will illuminate the night sky like never before. The LEDs offer an impressive 16 million color options, making every throw a vibrant and mesmerizing experience. Plus, the brightness of these lights is 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc on the market, ensuring maximum visibility even in the darkest conditions.

The TOSY Flying Disc is not just your average disc. It comes equipped with smart modes that allow you to adjust the brightness level and set a timer, giving you complete control over your game. The motion sensors automatically light up the disc, adding a touch of magic to your throws.

Say goodbye to constantly buying batteries, because this disc is rechargeable! With just a 30-minute charge duration, you'll be ready to play for up to a thousand throws or enjoy a full 90-minute match. The package includes a USB Type C to C cable for easy and convenient charging. Please note that the charger is not included.

Weighing in at 175 grams, the TOSY Flying Disc is designed to meet professional standards. Its durability is top-notch, with a waterproof construction that ensures it can withstand any weather conditions. Whether you're playing in the rain or by the beach, this disc is built to last.

The TOSY Flying Disc is perfect for a variety of use cases. Enjoy thrilling night play, show off your freestyle tricks, or engage in exciting disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes. Its flight quality is long, straight, and precise, making each throw a breeze. The comfortable grip provides excellent control, and its suitability for tricks adds an extra level of excitement to your game.

Join the league of ultimate flying disc enthusiasts and experience the game-changer disc that is the TOSY Flying Disc. Buy now and elevate your outdoor adventures to new heights!
